var options = { params: {} }; for (var i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) { var inputField = keys[i]; if (_.get(inputField,'exclude') !== true) { if (inputField.value) { options.params[inputField.mapping] = inputField.value; } } }; $scope.gotIt = false; // dummy executes after jsGrid element is added to DOM $scope.dummy = function () { if ($scope.gotIt) { return; } $scope.gotIt = true; if (!url) { return } $http.get(url, options) .then(processResult) .catch(function(e){ console.log(e.message) }); }
